Articles.Content: Hey, long(ish) time player, first time poster. I've been playing since 0.13 I believe (pre minmus, anyway) and I finally decided to register on these glorious forums. I've got a heap of mission shots (successful and failed) and can't wait to post some - I've only got as far as Duna, but I reckon I'm pretty good at docking. Well, thank you Squad, for such a great game - keep it up!
